features: LIFEFACTORY BABY BOTTLES are made with high quality thermal shock-resistant borosilicate glass that allows safe transition from freezer to boiling water. See Care and Use for details
DURABLE SILICONE SLEEVES - Our baby bottle is wrapped in a protective silicone sleeve that helps prevent breakage and provides an easier grip for little hands
LIFEFACTORY 4OZ borosilicate glass baby bottle includes a silicone sleeve, polypropylene cap, ring, and stopper, and a Stage 1 (0-3 months) silicone nipple
EASY TO CLEAN – Our bottles and accessories are dishwasher and sterilization safe - place cap parts and nipple on top rack/no need to remove silicone sleeve
BUILT WITH CARE - This product is made with high quality materials in USA and Europe
body.description: Product Description Our baby bottles are made of the highest quality, thermal shock resistant borosilicate glass. This allows our bottles to transition safely from freezer to boiling water. The silicone sleeves provide a good gripping surface for little hands and help protect against the occasional drop. Includes 4-ounce (120 ml) bottle with Stage 1 (0-3 mos) nipple. Care and Use -Before first use, place in dishwasher or in boiling water for 3 minutes. This is to ensure hygiene. Immediately after use, disassemble individual top components (e.g. nipple from top or valve from cap). All parts are dishwasher safe (top rack only). To wash by hand: wash separately in hot, soapy water and rinse thoroughly. Bottle and sleeve may be placed in the dishwasher or boiled without removal of the sleeve. If you wish to remove the sleeve, it comes off best in warm, soapy water. To allow venting and prevent nipple/valve collapse, do not over-tighten screw top From the Manufacturer Lifefactory's glass baby bottles are bisphenol-A (BPA), phthalate, and polyvinyl chloride (PVC) free.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CRAFTED WITH CARE High-quality glass made in France for a pure taste, with protective non-slip silicone sleeves and caps made in the USA. PROTECTIVE SILICONE SLEEVES Durable silicone sleeves provide non-slip grip and help protect glass while delivering a pop of color. DISHWASHER & STERILIZATION SAFE Easy to clean: the bottle stays inside the silicone sleeve, and goes right in the dishwasher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product - if you are interested in glass
reviews.reviewText: Glass bottles and avoiding plastic are a high priority for me when it comes to choosing a bottle for my baby. These bottles have leach free glass, and don't have large plastic ventilators in them like the born free glass bottles we got. I am breast feeding our baby, and about a week into using the born free bottles I dropped an empty one and it shattered. That made me think of two things, one, glass flying everywhere is not safe, and two, what if that had been full of milk and my baby's only available meal? She is still small, only three months, but soon I can tell she will be trying to hold the bottle more when she drinks it.These bottles are more resistant to breaking than other glass bottles.Another pro of these bottles is how many colors they come in. I am trying to establish a freezer supply of breast milk, and they make it easy to keep track of what was pumped when. Because the bottles are so expensive, I pour the milk into ball jelly jars to freeze it. There is no residue left on the bottle when I pour the milk into the ball jar, even if the milk was cooling in the fridge. That is important, because if you are combining milk from different pumping sessions, you can only combine cold with cold.They do attach to the Medela pump, but not perfectly. If you tighten it to much, it will become detached. For me, that is ok, and a lot better than pumping into plastic, then pouring into glass.Some people have issues with the nipple, that has not been a problem for us at all. In fact I like this nipple better than the born free, because that one seemed to make my daughter lazy when she breast fed. With these bottles, she has to work a little more.They are expensive, but we are hoping to have more kids, and these will definitely hold up. I am also planning to purchase the sippy cup caps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality product
reviews.reviewText: I have been used it for all of my kids to prevent them of plastic exposure and this serves the purpose really well as it is made of glass. silicone sleeve it comes with is a huge plus which make me satisfied while handing over it to my kids. A really good and quality purchase for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and easy to clean.
reviews.reviewText: Use it with just the cap for juice in lunches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will last for a long time
reviews.reviewText: I have several of these bottles and they are my favorite for my now 11 month old. I like that they’re glass and silicon and LOVE that they are so easy to Clean with only the bottle, plastic top and nipple. They were perfect for when I’d pour breast milk in but when I switched to formula recently, they can be kind of messy when making bottles because the formula scoop is about the same size as the bottle opening. It just takes a little time to get the hang of it and I make sure I wipe off the top of the bottle so it’s not wet when I’m trying to add the formula. It wouldn’t deter me from using these again with the next baby and I’m sure they’ll last! With my first baby, I went through several bottles because they weren’t as durable as these. These will last for the next baby even! Plus they are beautiful with vibrant colors on the silicon sleeves!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the bottle, not the nipple.
reviews.reviewText: The bottle is great, but the nipple was way to fast for my breastfed baby. We replaced with an evenflo slow flow and it was great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2014
reviews.reviewText: I love these bottles. I had three and bought this one so I could use these bottles exclusively (I send 4 bottles a day to daycare). The bottles look great, are study but not easily breakable, and go right in the dishwasher. I've not seen other babies using these either, which is a bonus (so bottles never get mixed up). My baby gets pumped breastmilk at daycare, so I can likely use these (won't need larger ones) until she moves on to drinking out of cups. I think these have tops you can switch out to make them sippy cups as well. Although these are 4 oz bottles, you can fit an extra 1/2 oz to an oz in there if you wanted to.I did switch out the nipples with Dr. Brown's preemie flow nipples, just because my daughter does fine with them and I'd like to avoid making bottle feeding "too easy" on her (so she'll still want to breastfeed). Great purchase & worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2017
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these bottles. I purchased 3. 2 4oz and 1 8oz. I was worried about using glass for obvious reasons. This bottle can really handle a lot! My daughter has tossed the bottles out of her crib, stroller and highchair without any damage to the bottle. I drive a large SUV and the bottles have fallen on the ground when I've opens her door and the trunk!!! No damage! The only thing that has done any damage to these bottles was my husband tighten the lid so tightly that the plastic lid cracked a little bit in one top. But still usable!!!It took me a few tries to perfect pouring the powder formula in the bottle but it wasn't a big deal. Measuring the exact ounces of water was never difficult I just tried to be as precise as I could be.The bottles clean so nicely! The thought of a plastic bottle or sippy just grosses me out now!I purchased the sippy top and they work great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Caps don’t stay on
reviews.reviewText: Bottle is nice but the caps for the lids do not stay on and it’s so annoying when you don’t want the nipple to get dirty

reviews.reviewTitle: Calidad buena a un precio muy alto
reviews.reviewText: No deja de ser un biberón. Q como todos se rompe porque se cae o la tetina se abre por mordedura. Lo cual tiene una duración limitada. Menos el precio a no es limitado me parece excesivo. Y se abusa porque siempre pensamos q nuestros peques necesitan lo mejor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 12, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This is our 3th bottle from this brandWe really love it

reviews.reviewTitle: Me encantó, es lo que esperaba
reviews.reviewText: El producto es perfectamente igual a lo que se aprecia en las fotografías, físicamente se percibe de buena calidad.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente calidas. Mi niño las adora
reviews.reviewText: Son excelente calidad. Las compré con unas tapitas de sippycup tambien.Mi toddler las ha tirado y no les ha pasado nada.
